languages.text: "Я огласил себе приговор. Дело не в этом проклятом месте, хотя оно меня окончательно доломало. Я не могу больше — не могу больше видеть лживых губернаторов, не могу видеть сволочей, отдавшихся скверне, не могу видеть людей, ставших игрушками ксеносов..."

"I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. This accursed place is not the cause of it, though it did push me past breaking point. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption, the people who become the playthings of xenos..."
languages.original_text: "Я огласил себе приговор. Дело не в этом проклятом месте, хотя оно меня окончательно доломало. Я не могу больше — не могу больше видеть лживых губернаторов, не могу видеть сволочей, отдавшихся скверне, не могу видеть людей, ставших игрушками ксеносов..."

traits.locale_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. The accursed place is not the cause of it, though it did push me past breaking point. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption, the people who become the playthings of xenos..."

"I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. This accursed place is not the cause of it, though it did push me past breaking point. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption, the people who become the playthings of xenos..."

"I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. This accursed place is not the cause of it, though it did push me past breaking point. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption, the people who become the playthings of xenos..."

languages.text: 「俺は自分自身を裁き、判決を下した。この呪われた場所が原因じゃないけど、俺の限界を越えさせたのは確かだ。もうこれ以上、嘘をつく総督たち、腐敗に屈する悪党たち、異種族の玩具となる人々を見ていることはできない…」
languages.original_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. This accursed place is not the cause of it, though it did push me past breaking point. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption, the people who become the playthings of xenos..."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は自分自身を裁き、判決を下した。この呪われた場所が原因じゃないけど、俺の限界を越えさせたのは確かだ。もうこれ以上、嘘をつく総督たち、腐敗に屈する悪党たち、異種族の玩具となる人々を見ていることはできない…」

languages.text: "Ich habe über mich geurteilt und die Strafe verhängt. Dieser verfluchte Ort ist nicht die Ursache, aber er hat mich über meine Belastungsgrenze gebracht. Ich kann so nicht mehr weitermachen – ich kann die verlogenen Gouverneure nicht mehr sehen, die Schurken, die der Korruption anheimfallen, die Leute, die zu Spielzeug der Xenos werden ..."
languages.original_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. This accursed place is not the cause of it, though it did push me past breaking point. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption, the people who become the playthings of xenos..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe über mich geurteilt und die Strafe verhängt. Dieser verfluchte Ort ist nicht die Ursache, aber er hat mich über meine Belastungsgrenze gebracht. Ich kann so nicht mehr weitermachen – ich kann die verlogenen Gouverneure nicht mehr sehen, die Schurken, die der Korruption anheimfallen, die Leute, die zu Spielzeug der Xenos werden ..."

languages.text: « Je me suis jugé et condamné moi-même. Ce n'est pas la faute de ce lieu maudit, même si c'est lui qui m'a poussé dans mes derniers retranchements. Je ne tolère plus tout ceci : je ne peux plus supporter la vue de ces gouverneurs malhonnêtes, de ces scélérats qui succombent à la corruption, de ces gens manipulés par les xénos... »
languages.original_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. This accursed place is not the cause of it, though it did push me past breaking point. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption, the people who become the playthings of xenos..."

traits.locale_text: « Je me suis jugé et condamné moi-même. Ce n'est pas la faute de ce lieu maudit, même si c'est lui qui m'a poussé dans mes derniers retranchements. Je ne tolère plus tout ceci : je ne peux plus supporter la vue de ces gouverneurs malhonnêtes, de ces scélérats qui succombent à la corruption, de ces gens manipulés par les xénos... »

languages.text: «Me he juzgado a mí mismo y he dictado sentencia. Este lugar maldito no es el motivo, aunque ciertamente me ha llevado más allá del límite. No puedo seguir haciéndolo; estoy harto de gobernadores que mienten, rufianes que sucumben a la corrupción, personas convertidas en meros juguetes para los xenos...».
languages.original_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. This accursed place is not the cause of it, though it did push me past breaking point. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption, the people who become the playthings of xenos..."

traits.locale_text: «Me he juzgado a mí mismo y he dictado sentencia. Este lugar maldito no es el motivo, aunque ciertamente me ha llevado más allá del límite. No puedo seguir haciéndolo; estoy harto de gobernadores que mienten, rufianes que sucumben a la corrupción, personas convertidas en meros juguetes para los xenos...».

languages.text: “我已经对自己进行了审判，宣读了判决。这个遭到诅咒的地方并不是我崩溃的原因，尽管它确实把我逼到了崩溃的边缘。我再也受不了这一切了，我再也不想看到那些满口谎言的总督、投入腐化怀抱的渣滓、沦为异形玩物的人类……”
languages.original_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. This accursed place is not the cause of it, though it did push me past breaking point. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption, the people who become the playthings of xenos..."

traits.locale_text: “我已经对自己进行了审判，宣读了判决。这个遭到诅咒的地方并不是我崩溃的原因，尽管它确实把我逼到了崩溃的边缘。我再也受不了这一切了，我再也不想看到那些满口谎言的总督、投入腐化怀抱的渣滓、沦为异形玩物的人类……”

languages.text: "Kendi kendimi yargıladım, kendi cezamı kendim kestim. Bu lanet yer beni kırılma noktasının ötesine itmiş olsa da asıl sebep bu değil. Artık dayanamıyorum. Palavracı valilerin, yolsuzluğa boyun eğen alçakların, zenoların kuklası olan insanların yüzlerine bakmaya katlanamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I have judged myself and handed down the sentence. This accursed place is not the cause of it, though it did push me past breaking point. I cannot do it anymore — I cannot look at the lying governors, the scoundrels who succumb to corruption, the people who become the playthings of xenos..."

traits.locale_text: "Kendi kendimi yargıladım, kendi cezamı kendim kestim. Bu lanet yer beni kırılma noktasının ötesine itmiş olsa da asıl sebep bu değil. Artık dayanamıyorum. Palavracı valilerin, yolsuzluğa boyun eğen alçakların, zenoların kuklası olan insanların yüzlerine bakmaya katlanamıyorum."
